about_the_game:
Battle Shiba Barkade: Unleash the Fun with Three Epic Games! 🌟🎮

Dive into the Battle Shiba Barkade, a thrilling collection of three unique games, each offering a distinct and exhilarating gaming experience. Free and packed with action, this trio of games is a celebration of creativity and fun, inviting players to embark on diverse adventures across various gaming realms.

1️⃣ Starticus: Sci-Fi Gladitorial Combat 🏛️🗡️

Kick off your Barkade journey with "Starticus", a game that dazzled audiences at the 2023 Epic Megajam. This third-person action arcade fighter propels you into a future where ancient Roman gladiators are resurrected through advanced cloning technology. As the newest contender in this gladiatorial spectacle, you'll fight for honor and entertainment in an arena where history and future collide. Get ready to meet our dynamic hosts, Jon and John, as they usher you into an epic battle where the past meets the present!

2️⃣ Warp Drifters: High-Speed Racing in Space 🌌🏁

Next, strap in for "Cosmic Drift", a high-octane hover racing game set against the backdrop of space. Prepare to defy gravity as you race through astonishing 3D tracks that loop and swirl among the stars. Speed through cosmic landscapes, navigate through asteroid fields, and outmaneuver your opponents in a race where the sky is not the limit, but the starting line. Each race is not just a competition; it's a breathtaking journey through the wonders of the universe.

3️⃣ Eternal Impulse: Dynamic Combat and Platforming 🌟💥

For the final chapter in the Battle Shiba Barkade, we present "Eternal Impulse", a game that redefines isometric gameplay with a thrilling blend of verticality and combat. This game elevates the traditional 2D isometric field into a dynamic 3D battleground where jumping and dodging are as crucial as your combat skills. As you navigate through the multi-layered arenas, each leap and dash brings a new perspective to your battles. Survive the onslaught, adapt your tactics, and whatever you do, never stop shooting! 🚀🔥

Step into the Battle Shiba Barkade 🐕🕹️

The Battle Shiba Barkade is more than a collection of games; it's a gateway to diverse worlds of action and excitement. Whether you're a fan of intense combat, speed, or platforming, there's something here for everyone. Best of all, it's entirely free! So, are you ready to jump in and experience the excitement? The adventure begins now! 🚀💥

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 (1GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7770 (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i7 3770K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 780 Ti/970 (High settings) and 1070 (Ultra settings) or AMD R9 290/AMD RX480 (High settings)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
